en.name: Download Codes
en.longdescription: Once you've generated download codes for any of your assets this element handles redemption of those codes.
en.instructions: Generate codes for your asset on its page. This element makes a redemption form that can be used for all of your download codes. Simple. Once you've published this element do make sure and check a code before you send them out. ;)

description.en: Set the success message that you want your customers to see after they redeem their code.
